@ToryaWinters Oh dear!!! That's what scares me a bit too! Probably why I've always just stuck to the pill. 😞
@journalandstuff That's great to hear! Had a few positive replies about them so I'll definitely have to look into a bit more.

@SunaeFoal Thanks! Had a few positive replies about coils, so probably worth looking in to a bit more! I've always steered away from these alternative options, they scare me a bit but not sure why! Haha!

@MalieWatson Definitely trial and error! Just annoying because I thought I had found a pill that worked for me, been taking it for years and only just started getting really bad headaches! Better to be safe than sorry though!

@citygirlsblog I think now that I told them I've had bad headaches they can't prescribe the same pill again. Which is slightly annoying because it's been great apart from that. But better to be safe than sorry!
@MissGbenzo Thanks! I'll look into that one! 😊 Hope you are keeping well and congratulations on the bump! 💕 How exciting!

@littlethings_lb I've never had migraines before and have had no problems with this pill until the last few month when I've had a really really bad headache on the first day of my period. Might be totally unrelated, but they wont prescribe that pill again just incase.

*getting personal* The nurse wont renew my pill because I said I've had a few migraine like headaches. She said to consider all the alternative options; coil, implant etc. Does anybody use any of these options and care to share their thoughts?? 🤔
